Queries.Template:
SELECT c.Id, c.DocumentId, c.ContentItemId, c.ContentItemVersionId, c.Latest, c.Published, c.ContentType,
		c.ModifiedUtc, c.PublishedUtc, c.CreatedUtc, c.Owner, c.Author, c.DisplayText
FROM ContentItemIndex as c
JOIN TaxonomyIndex as t ON t.ContentItemId = c.ContentItemId
WHERE t.TermContentItemId = @categoryId and c.Published = 'true'
ORDER BY c.ModifiedUtc DESC
LIMIT @take OFFSET @skip
Queries.Name: PublishedAndCategory

Queries.Template:
SELECT COUNT(*) as Count
FROM ContentItemIndex as c
JOIN TaxonomyIndex as t ON t.ContentItemId = c.ContentItemId
WHERE t.TermContentItemId = @categoryId and c.Published = 'true'
Queries.Name: PublishedAndCategoryCount

Queries.Template:
SELECT c.Id, c.DocumentId, c.ContentItemId, c.ContentItemVersionId, c.Latest, c.Published, c.ContentType,
		c.ModifiedUtc, c.PublishedUtc, c.CreatedUtc, c.Owner, c.Author, c.DisplayText
FROM ContentItemIndex as c
JOIN TaxonomyIndex as t ON t.ContentItemId = c.ContentItemId
WHERE t.TermContentItemId = @categoryId and (c.Published = 'true' or ((c.Owner = @userId or c.Owner = @UserName) and c.Published = 'false'))
ORDER BY c.ModifiedUtc DESC
LIMIT @take OFFSET @skip
Queries.Name: AuthCategoryFilterAdvertisementsQuery

Queries.Template:
SELECT c.Id, c.DocumentId, c.ContentItemId, c.ContentItemVersionId, c.Latest, c.Published, c.ContentType,
		c.ModifiedUtc, c.PublishedUtc, c.CreatedUtc, c.Owner, c.Author, c.DisplayText
FROM ContentItemIndex as c
JOIN TaxonomyIndex as t ON t.ContentItemId = c.ContentItemId
WHERE t.TermContentItemId = @categoryId and (c.Owner = @userId or c.Owner = @UserName)
ORDER BY c.ModifiedUtc DESC
LIMIT @take OFFSET @skip
Queries.Name: AuthCategoryMyAdvertsFilterQuery

Queries.Template:
SELECT c.Id, c.DocumentId, c.ContentItemId, c.ContentItemVersionId, c.Latest, c.Published, c.ContentType,
		c.ModifiedUtc, c.PublishedUtc, c.CreatedUtc, c.Owner, c.Author, c.DisplayText
FROM ContentItemIndex as c
JOIN TaxonomyIndex as t ON t.ContentItemId = c.ContentItemId
WHERE c.Owner = @userId or c.Owner = @UserName
ORDER BY c.ModifiedUtc DESC
LIMIT @take OFFSET @skip
Queries.Name: AuthMyAdvertsFilterQuery

Queries.Template:
SELECT COUNT(*) as Count
FROM ContentItemIndex as c
JOIN TaxonomyIndex as t ON t.ContentItemId = c.ContentItemId
WHERE t.TermContentItemId = @categoryId and (c.Published = 'true' or ((c.Owner = @userId or c.Owner = @UserName) and c.Published = 'false'))
Queries.Name: AuthCategoryFilterAdvertisementsCountQuery

Queries.Template:
SELECT COUNT(*) as Count
FROM ContentItemIndex as c
JOIN TaxonomyIndex as t ON t.ContentItemId = c.ContentItemId
WHERE t.TermContentItemId = @categoryId and (c.Owner = @userId or c.Owner = @UserName)
Queries.Name: AuthCategoryMyAdvertsFilterCountQuery

Queries.Template:
SELECT COUNT(*) as Count
FROM ContentItemIndex as c
JOIN TaxonomyIndex as t ON t.ContentItemId = c.ContentItemId
WHERE c.Owner = @userId or c.Owner = @UserName
Queries.Name: AuthMyAdvertsFilterCountQuery

Queries.Template: SELECT * FROM ContentItemIndex WHERE Published = 'true' and ContentType = 'Advertisement'
Queries.Name: PublishedQuery

Queries.Template: SELECT COUNT(*) as Count FROM ContentItemIndex WHERE Published = 'true' and ContentType = 'Advertisement'
Queries.Name: PublishedCountQuery

Queries.Template:
SELECT c.Id, c.DocumentId, c.ContentItemId, c.ContentItemVersionId, c.Latest, c.Published, c.ContentType,
		c.ModifiedUtc, c.PublishedUtc, c.CreatedUtc, c.Owner, c.Author, c.DisplayText
FROM ContentItemIndex as c
JOIN TaxonomyIndex as t ON t.ContentItemId = c.ContentItemId
WHERE (c.Published = 'true' or ((c.Owner = @userId or c.Owner = @UserName) and c.Published = 'false'))
ORDER BY c.ModifiedUtc DESC
LIMIT @take OFFSET @skip
Queries.Name: AuthAdvertisementsQuery

Queries.Template:
SELECT COUNT(*) as Count
FROM ContentItemIndex as c
JOIN TaxonomyIndex as t ON t.ContentItemId = c.ContentItemId
WHERE (c.Published = 'true' or ((c.Owner = @userId or c.Owner = @UserName) and c.Published = 'false'))
Queries.Name: AuthAdvertisementCountQuery

Queries.Template:
SELECT c.Id, c.DocumentId, c.ContentItemId, c.ContentItemVersionId, c.Latest, c.Published, c.ContentType,
		c.ModifiedUtc, c.PublishedUtc, c.CreatedUtc, c.Owner, c.Author, c.DisplayText
FROM ContentItemIndex as c
JOIN TaxonomyIndex as t ON t.ContentItemId = c.ContentItemId
WHERE (@categoryId = '' or t.TermContentItemId = @categoryId) and c.Published = 'true'
ORDER BY c.ModifiedUtc DESC
LIMIT @take OFFSET @skip
Queries.Name: CommonNotAuthQuery

Queries.Template:
SELECT COUNT(*) as Count
FROM ContentItemIndex as c
JOIN TaxonomyIndex as t ON t.ContentItemId = c.ContentItemId
WHERE (@categoryId = '' or t.TermContentItemId = @categoryId) and c.Published = 'true'
Queries.Name: CommonNotAuthCountQuery

Queries.Template:
SELECT c.Id, c.DocumentId, c.ContentItemId, c.ContentItemVersionId, c.Latest, c.Published, c.ContentType,
		c.ModifiedUtc, c.PublishedUtc, c.CreatedUtc, c.Owner, c.Author, c.DisplayText
FROM ContentItemIndex as c
JOIN TaxonomyIndex as t ON t.ContentItemId = c.ContentItemId
WHERE ((c.Published = 'false' and (c.Owner = @userId or c.Owner = @UserName)) or c.Published = 'true') and 
(@categoryId = '' or t.TermContentItemId = @categoryId) and
((@filterId = '' or @filterName = '') or (c.Owner = @filterId or c.Owner = @filterName))
ORDER BY c.ModifiedUtc DESC
LIMIT @take OFFSET @skip
Queries.Name: CommonAuthQuery

Queries.Template:
SELECT COUNT(*) as Count
FROM ContentItemIndex as c
JOIN TaxonomyIndex as t ON t.ContentItemId = c.ContentItemId
WHERE ((c.Published = 'false' and (c.Owner = @userId or c.Owner = @UserName)) or c.Published = 'true') and 
(@categoryId = '' or t.TermContentItemId = @categoryId) and
((@filterId = '' or @filterName = '') or (c.Owner = @filterId or c.Owner = @filterName))
Queries.Name: CommonAuthCountQuery

ContentPartSettings.Description: Provides a Liquid formatted body for your content item.
Provides an editor for the common properties of a content item.
Provides a way to define custom aliases for content items.
Provides a way to define the url that is used to render your content item for preview. You only need to use this for the content preview feature when running the frontend decoupled from the admin.
Provides a Title for your content item.
Provides a custom url for your content item.
Add a list behavior.
Provides a way to add widgets to Layout zones for your content item.
Provides an HTML Body for your content item.
Provides a customizable body for your content item where you can build a content structure with widgets.
Provides a collection behavior for your content item where you can place other content items.
Turns your content item into a form.
Provides attributes common to all form elements.
Provides attributes common to all input form elements.
Provides label properties.
Provides input field properties.
Provides text area properties.
Provides select field properties.
Provides button properties.
Displays a validation summary.
Displays a field validation error.
Provides a Markdown formatted body for your content item.
